product_name: The North Face Ultra 109 Gore-Tex XCR Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The North Face Ultra 109 Gore-Tex XCR trail-running shoes deliver rugged, reliable, waterproof performance for the roughest, wettest trails. A combination of polyurethane-coated leather, nylon mesh and thermoplastic urethane create flexible uppers with stability that is just right for the trail. Supportive thermoplastic urethane overlays wrap ankles and heels for enhanced support; vented toe caps add durability and breathability. Gore-Tex(R) XCR(R) membranes provide waterproof protection and superior breathability; gusseted tongues keep debris out. Nylon linings wick internal moisture away from your feet and dry quickly for enhanced comfort. Removable multi-density footbeds offer cushioning and comfort. Dual-density EVA and polyurethane midsoles provide shock absorption and support; medial posting in forefeet delivers extra support for overpronators. Thermoplastic urethane shank plate provides lightweight support and stability. North Face Ultra 109 Gore-Tex XCR trail runners have durable rubber outsoles for reliable traction and stability over rugged terrain.
short_description: The North Face Ultra 109 Gore-Tex XCR trail-running shoes deliver rugged, reliable, waterproof performance for the roughest, wettest trails.
